title: No Shortage! (The Power Of Therefore)
description: There is no shortage of God’s grace. In “No Shortage! (The Power Of Therefore)” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reminds us that, no matter what we’re facing, God’s purpose will prevail.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: There is no shortage of God’s grace. In “No Shortage! (The Power Of Therefore)” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reminds us that, no matter what we’re facing, God’s purpose will prevail.
